title: Foundational Competency Enhancement Program for Medical Data Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge in Medical or Public Health Fields
context.additional_context: Modular Design Optimized for Smartphone-Based Learning to Address Gaps in Data Management Practical Skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain the processes of collecting, storing, and managing medical data.
Learners can apply data quality management standards and ethical sharing principles
Learners can explain methods for estimating data management costs within a limited budget

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
